content:
image.png Update coverage to fully implement the base R4 Gaurantor resource – not constrained.
Update to use HCPCS, not CPT for coding for device based.
How to route based on the inbound
How do we identify the source of the data as far as a system or source identifier? 
Should references be fully qualified URLs?

Should references be fully qualified URLs?

Relative refences mean that they are relative to the base of the resource created/updated. If a reference is to a resource on a different FHIR server, it must be a full URL.
Agree to use full URL. As we don't know exactly from which EHR/ordering supplier site when DME FHIR server receives PAO order request from DHR / ordering supplier.
